edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.SpyNin
Class Ninja

java.lang.Object
  edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.SpyNin.Character
      edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.SpyNin.Ninja
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Ninja
extends Character

The Ninja object determines the attributes and behavior of a ninja. A ninja has lives, which are reduced by one when the die. Ninjas can die and move.

See Also:
